sentences.sentence: Turkey's foreign minister Hakan Fidan has told Volodymyr Zelenskyy he sees no safe alternative to last year's Black Sea grain deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spain's national women's football team is going on strike, refusing to play until Federation President Luis Rubiales resigns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Rubiales has defied calls to step down, insisting that a kiss on the lips with player Jenny Hermoso during a World Cup medal ceremony last week was consensual, a claim she strongly denied.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Pressure is mounting on 46-year-old Rubiales, with Spain's acting prime minister, players' unions and even some players on men's teams joining the calls for him to go.

sentences.sentence: The Kremlin has denied killing the mercenaries, President Putin's spokesman urging patience as the official investigation proceeds. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy claims that Kyiv had nothing to do with the death of Prigozhin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, we also see that these ways will not be an alternative to the original initiative and there are risks.

sentences.sentence: Президент Зеленський сказав, що спробування з Туркменом може бути вирішеною, щоб вирішити безпеку для українських серіал-експортів.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Говорили про формулу миру та підготовку глобального саміту миру.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Разом з Туреччиною ми можемо крок за кроком безпеку повертати, що вже неодноразово доводили. Russia refused to abide by the grain deal in June, saying that some crucial parts of the agreement haven't been fulfilled by the partners.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Moscow is demanding an easing of international sanctions against it, particularly regarding its own agricultural exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The director of London's British Museum is stepping down following a series of thefts from the collections of one of the world's most prestigious cultural institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Hartwig Fischer has been under pressure since the announcement earlier this month that a series of items from the collections, some dating back to the 15th century BC, had gone missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It has since emerged that the museum was made aware of the thefts in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In his resignation statement, Mr. Fisher said he accepted that the museum did not respond as comprehensively as it should have at the time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Spanish police have announced the record seizure of almost nine and a half tons of cocaine during an operation in the port of Algeciras.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The huge drug shipment was discovered hidden in boxes of bananas half tons of cocaine during an operation in the port of Algeciras.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The huge drug shipment was discovered hidden in boxes of bananas onboard a maritime container arriving from Ecuador.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Police said the packages had been stamped with more than 30 different logos corresponding to the European criminal networks that were meant as the recipients.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The cargo was due to be moved to Portugal for later distribution throughout Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: No arrests have been made so far.
